nodes.text: A human female cruise director served aboard the MPO-1400 Star Cruiser Halcyon during the First Order/Resistance War. A cheerful individual and lover of adventure, she was inspired by the efforts of those who sought to bring peace to a tumultuous galaxy.
The cruise director is set to appear in the upcoming immersive hotel experience Star Wars: Galactic Starcruiser, set to open in 2022 at the Walt Disney World Resort.
